AdjustedById.description: The contact or the user that performs the adjustment.

AdjustmentValue.description: The positive or negative value of the appraisal adjustment.

AppraisalId.description: The appraisal record for which an adjustment is made.

AppraisalItemId.description: The appraisal item record for which an adjustment is made

Description.description: The description of the appraisal adjustment.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp indicating the last time the current user viewed a related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp indicating when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the appraisal adjustment.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the adjustment.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the appraisal adjustment.
